name: Chhota Ganesh-Cycle Ride
description:
Help Cute Ganapati when he drives by making a path and gets all laddus collect with doing cycle ride.
Most awaited and beloved Ganesha Indian festival celebration started! Now don’t wait to play this unique addictive hyper-casual adventurous cycle ride game with unique tricks. Tap and Hold to stretch the 3D stick to place accurately on the blocks to make a way for Ganesh, also collect Laddus on your way. In case if you place the path in the wrong way and Ganesha have no more paths, Lord Shiva will come to save him. Try to make him perfect cute bicycle rider.
All audience including kids can enjoy this cartoon cute game since it is family supported game build with special emotion. Beware of the spike on the path and avoid hitting them, try to make the biggest score and challenge your friends and family. Mind it sure it’s a challenging game.
Features:
• Attractive & colorful game
• Leaderboard to check the score
• Option to share it on various messaging platforms
• Design of heaven in this iOS game
• Sound option
• Instruction option
• Easy to understand the concept
Well, you can decorate our cute little Ganesh with modern outfits like a cap, goggles, etc. Unlike other free cute games in this, you can also change the different types of best cute bicycles.
Play this bicycle game specially made for Indian God Lord Baby Ganesha lovers and share this kids game with your friends. It’s among unique Indian games for kids.

Ganpati Bappa Morya Mangal Murti Morya!
